title: "Sorry, unrecognized username or password"
body: I get this sometimes when trying to log in to the boards. It happens because the boards default my server to NA. If you get this message, you need to make sure the server you've selected on the left (underneath the league of legends logo) is the server your account is connected to. This has been a PSA.

replies.body:
Hey,

This happens when you visit na.leagueoflegends.com and then come to the OCE boards. You can easily change it by selecting the correct server under the League of Legends logo in the top left corner like you said.

Yep, marauder hit the nail on the head.

If you go to na.leagueoflegends and post there, and come back to the oce boards, you will find it has issues switching between them.
You shouldn't have to login again, just switch region in the top left of the page.

I just had this happen to me as well as I was posting on the Riot Store thread and came back and had issues posting.
